extra.enrollment_requirement:
Corequisite     MATH280 or MATH221.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from STAT351; STAT268.

basic.description: Basic probability theory; conditioning; densities, expectation; jointly distributed random variables, transformations, generating functions, limit laws. Distributions: binomial, Poisson, hypergeometric, uniform, exponential,  gamma, normal, bivariate normal. Elementary random processes.
basic.subject: STAT
basic.title: Probability I
